summary: "It Ends with Us" is a popular romance novel by Colleen Hoover about an abusive relationship. It was inspired by her parents' experience and is considered her toughest work. The book, published in 2016, has sold over a million copies and was turned into a movie in 2024. It gained even more fame in 2021 through the social media app TikTok. A sequel, "It Starts with Us," was released in 2022. The story highlights important issues like domestic violence and emotional abuse.
title: It Ends with Us
